title: What Does the 😎🕶️ Sunglasses Emoji Mean?

steps.title: On Snapchat, a 😎 means you have a mutual best friend.
steps.content: On Snapchat, a 😎 means you have a mutual best friend. You have a Best Friend in common if you see a 😎 next to a friend’s username. This is the universal Snapchat symbol for Mutual BFs, so reach out! You never know what new friends you can make. [1] X Research source

steps.title: The 😎 says, “I’m cool!”
steps.content: The 😎 says, “I’m cool!” This sunglasses emoji can be used to represent confident moods and carefree vibes. You may see this emoji floating around when someone feels like they’re on top of the world. [2] X Research source “You wish you were as cool as me 😎” “Thanks, dude! I knew I could count on you! 😎👍”

steps.title: A 😎 is used to describe anything awesome.
steps.content: A 😎 is used to describe anything awesome. You’ll probably see this sunglasses emoji paired with words like “swag,” “cool,” and “lit.” With its chill demeanor and stylish shades, the 😎 conveys laid-back vibes. [3] X Research source “They wish they were as awesome as us! 😎” “Like my new jeans, bro? #swag 😎”

steps.title: The 😎 radiates confidence.
steps.content: The 😎 radiates confidence. Is there anything more confident than a pair of stylish sunglasses? This emoji is often used to convey a carefree, prideful, or even cocky energy. [4] X Research source “They asked for my number. No biggie 😎💁‍♀️” “Got a 95% on the biology exam 😎”

steps.title: A 😎 can be used when talking about vacation.
steps.content: A 😎 can be used when talking about vacation. You might see someone use a 😎 if they're relaxing on the beach or enjoying any other fun, sunny activity on a trip. [5] X Research source “Wishing you were here! The sun is gorgeous 😎☀️” “This vacation was definitely needed 😎”

steps.title: When you’re feeling cool:
steps.content: When you’re feeling cool: If you’re proud of yourself, don’t be afraid to show it! Add a 😎 to your text to show your friend just how awesome you are. Try pairing it with a ✌️ or 👍 to show that you’re all about those chill vibes. “You live and you learn, bro 😎✌️” “Got an A+ on the final 😎”

steps.title: When something’s awesome:
steps.content: When something’s awesome: Use the 😎 when you’re talking about something legendary. Replace words like “awesome,” “lit,” “swag,” or “cool” to make your message even more epic. [6] X Research source “Did you see that skateboarding trick? One day I’m going to be able to do that! 😎” “Bro! That was 😎!”

steps.title: When you’re confident:
steps.content: When you’re confident: Once you slip those glasses on, you’re one cool cat! Try using the 😎 when you feel like you’re on top of the world. [7] X Research source “She was totally digging this 😎” “They offered me a promotion, and how could I say no? 😎”

steps.title: When you’re on vacation:
steps.content: When you’re on vacation: Is there a better feeling than being on vacation? If you’re chilling out and relaxing by the pool, use a 😎 paired with other vacation emojis like the 🏖️ or 👙 to show how much fun you’re having. “Summer break is off to a great start 😎🏖️” “Sunbathing before we hit another waterpark 😎 I love vacation!!”

steps.title: Above all else, the 🕶️ is a pair of sunglasses.
steps.content: Above all else, the 🕶️ is a pair of sunglasses. Sometimes emojis simply mean what they are. Sunglasses are the perfect accessory for almost any outfit, and you might see someone use the 🕶️ when they’re feeling fashionable. “Do you like my outfit? Not sure if the 🕶️ work or not 🤔” “LOVE THIS LOOK 🕶️💃🏻”

steps.title: The 🕶️ says, “Hey! It’s bright outside!”
steps.content: The 🕶️ says, “Hey! It’s bright outside!” You may see this sunglasses emoji paired with a ☀️ to symbolize blazing hot weather. Chances are, if they send you a 🕶️, it’s hot out there! [8] X Research source “Grab the sunblock because it’s very sunny!! 🕶️☀️” “Dude! Brace yourself. It’s scorching out there 🥵🕶️☀️”

steps.title: The 🕶️ represents all things “cool.”
steps.content: The 🕶️ represents all things “cool.” Sunglasses have become a symbol of coolness in the fashion world, and the 🕶️ is no different. You’ll most likely see this sunglasses emoji if someone’s talking about something awesome. [9] X Research source “I got to get a pair of shades like Elvis. Man, he was so cool! 🕺🕶️” “Did you see that flip?? 🤯🕶️”

steps.title: The 🕶️ might also mean something shady is going on.
steps.content: The 🕶️ might also mean something shady is going on. The dark tint of sunglasses helps shade your eyes from the sun’s bright rays, but the sun isn’t the only thing they can protect you from. Some people use the 🕶️ to denote shadiness or shifty vibes. [10] X Research source “Yikes. That sounds shady if you ask me 🕶️🤨” “This email seems suspicious 🕶️ Did you guys get one too?”

steps.title: When you’re feeling fashionable:
steps.content: When you’re feeling fashionable: Send a pic of your fabulous outfit or cool shades with a 🕶️. This says, “Hey, I’m feeling awesome. Check out my look!” “Like my new sunglasses? SPF 50 baby! 🕶️” “Today’s look featuring my new shades 🕶️”

steps.title: When it’s hot outside:
steps.content: When it’s hot outside: Try sending a 🕶️ and ☀️ when it’s sweltering outside. You can also use this pairing to caption a post about a hot summer’s day. [11] X Research source “Don’t forget to bring sunglasses or a hat on our walk! It’s so sunny out there! 🕶️☀️” “You know it’s going to be a beautiful day when you gotta pull out the shades 🕶️☀️”

steps.title: When something’s cool:
steps.content: When something’s cool: Use the 🕶️ to replace the word “cool” or whenever you’re mentioning something unbelievably awesome. Shades are one cool accessory, and adding them to your messages or caption can make you cool as well! “You’re one 🕶️ dude!” “Girl, Black Widow had some epic moves in that movie 🕶️💥”

steps.title: When something’s shady:
steps.content: When something’s shady: Toss a 🕶️ at the end of your message if you think something’s sketchy. This is a great way to keep your friends in the know while still looking cool. “Ben is up to no good. I don’t trust this ‘I’m doing laundry’ business 🕶️” “That guy’s being super sketch by the bar 🕶️ Let’s go somewhere else.”

steps.title: June 27th is National Sunglasses Day, making the 😎 and 🕶️ the stars of the show!
steps.content: June 27th is National Sunglasses Day, making the 😎 and 🕶️ the stars of the show! You may notice on this fun holiday that these emojis are used alongside #NationalSunglassesDay by companies and sunglasses fans alike. Join the fun by posting a pic of your favorite shades along with a 😎 or 🕶️ and #NationalSunglassesDay. [12] X Research source

steps.title: The 😎🕶️ emojis are related to other summery emojis.
steps.content: The 😎🕶️ emojis are related to other summery emojis. Check out these other emojis and what they mean to celebrate the sunshine or show off your stylish, cool vibe: The ☀️ (sun) emoji symbolizes summer, sunshine, hot weather, or happiness. The 🏖️ (beach with umbrella) emoji represents summer, sunshine, or vacation. The 🔥 (fire) emoji refers to something cool, awesome, or trendy. It can also symbolize heat, passion, or energy. The 💯 (100 points) emoji means something is cool or authentic. It also expresses agreement. The 😏 (smirking face) emoji represents coolness, slyness, flirtiness, or smugness.
